title: Samwise Gamgee
summary: Samwise Gamgee (/ˈsæmˌwaɪz ˈɡæmˌdʒiː/; later known as Samwise Gardner[T 1]) is a fictional character in J. R. R. Tolkien's Middle-earth. A hobbit, Samwise is the chief supporting character of The Lord of the Rings, serving as the sidekick of the protagonist Frodo Baggins. Sam is a member of the Fellowship of the Ring, the group of nine charged with destroying the One Ring to prevent the Dark Lord Sauron from taking over the world.
